definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway

sentences.english: Liddy, the master's great-granddaughter, was about Bathsheba's equal in age.
sentences.chinese: 麗蒂是作坊師傅的重孫女，和巴絲謝芭年齡相仿。

sentences.english: The pottery workshop site was discovered in the city site of Zheng and Han states.
sentences.chinese: 在鄭韓故城發現的陶作坊遺址，主要遺蹟有窯址羣。

sentences.english: They became farmers and merchants, worked in mills and factories.
sentences.chinese: 他們成爲農民和商人，在作坊和工廠裏勞作。

sentences.english: Both photographer and subject form part of the group of 30 visually impaired or blind people learning photography with the help of the Mexico City foundation Ojos Que Sienten, or Eyes That Feel.
sentences.chinese: 攝影師及被攝者均參加了“感覺的眼睛”攝影工作坊。

sentences.english: Several boys try to catch a glimpse of a cockfight in the tannery section of the slums.
sentences.chinese: 幾個男孩正設法在貧民窟製革作坊裏看鬥雞。

sentences.english: The carpenter was hammering in his workshop.
There is also found a neighbourhood named Gan'Jiang'Fang or Ganjiang Smithy where reputedly the couple had cast swords.
sentences.chinese: 還有一座干將坊，人們說是當年干將鑄劍的作坊。

sentences.english: After the liberation of the so-called pharmaceutical companies is also a workshop.
sentences.chinese: 解放後所謂的中藥廠其實也是一個作坊。

sentences.english: In China, pig intestines are often cooked in unregulated family workshops.
sentences.chinese: 在國內，豬腸通常於家庭作坊內加工，缺乏監管。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have unearthed evidence of glass-working and bone-carving workshops.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家已發現了玻璃作坊和骨雕作坊的證據。

sentences.english: Archaeologists have unearthed evidence of glass-working and bone-carving workshops.
sentences.chinese: 考古學家已發現了玻璃作坊和骨雕作坊的證據。

sentences.english: This time-line must be brought to the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 請一定把這張紙帶到工作坊來。

sentences.english: Bowyer allows for the recruitment of basic missile units.
sentences.chinese: 制弓作坊允許訓練基本的遠程部隊。

sentences.english: Between the two workspaces stood a little house with hydrangeas in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 兩個作坊間的院子裏有間小屋，上面還有個繡花球。

sentences.english: Workshop sessions will be interactive and case-based, with emphasis on evidence-based practice.
sentences.chinese: 工作坊將互動和以防爲主，強調循證實踐。

sentences.english: The names of the walk-in activities related to the same topic as the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 展覽攤位可與工作坊有相同的活動名稱。

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
